text: A New Leaf is a 1971 American black comedy movie directed by Elaine May (who also stars) and was based on the short story The Green Heart by Jack Ritchie. It also stars Walter Matthau, Jack Weston, George Rose, James Coco, Doris Roberts and William Redfield and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. In 2019, the Library of Congress selected A New Leaf into the United States National Film Registry. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1971 romantic comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies about marriage Category:Movies about murder Category:United States National Film Registry movies Category:American satirical movies Category:1970s black comedy movies
title: A New Leaf
